README.p: Please referto our [WebPal Developer Guide](https://www.gitbook.com/book/palomino/webpaldev/details) for more information on how to use WebPal extensions
NOTE: 'extensions-essentials' is required for all WebPal extensions
A staff-list is a list of staff members where alldata is kept in an editable table with few options to stylize the layout
Simplyadd this plugin to your WebPalextensions
Insert a staff-list into a page you are creating
No need to edit any code; add any preferred CSS styling on top of what's available
